extends java.lang.Object

                                        java.lang.String degree)
        The method to rotate lake tile according to the given degree(0/90/180/270).
        Parameters:
        tileInHand - The lake tile rotated by the degree.
        degree - The angle to which lake tile will be rotated.
        Returns:
        The rotated lake tile according to the degree.

      • validateWinner

        public static java.util.Vector<Players> validateWinner(Players[] gamePlayers)
        The method to determine the winners of the game and to store the winner players in a vector. If the score of two players is same, then their corresponding lantern cards count will be checked to determine the winner.But if the lantern cards are also same, then favor tokens will be counted. If favor tokens are also same then both players will be winner
        Parameters:
        gamePlayers - The array of players of the game.

      • replenishLakeTilesInHand

        public static boolean replenishLakeTilesInHand(GameInstance gameObj,
                                               Players playing)
        The method to replenish lake tile from draw stack to the players hand, after the player has placed the lake tile on the board.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating the lantern cards of the game board.
        playing - The current player of the game.

      • removePlacedLakeTile

        public Players removePlacedLakeTile(LakeTiles tileInHand,
                                    Players playing)
        The method to remove the lake tile from player's hand.
        Parameters:
        tileInHand - The lake tile to be removed.
        playing - The player of the game from whose hand the given lake tiles will be removed.
        Returns:
        The player of the game with update lake tiles in hand.
